ADD_USER_NOT_FOUND: User with the number {{phoneNumber}} is not a registered SoAR user. Do you want to add it still?
ALREADY_LOGGED_IN_TEXT: You were automatically logged out, because you logged in from another device.
ERROR_USER_OFFLINE: Looks like that user is offline!
INFO_CONTENT: SoAR is an MIT-licensed open-source application developed in the Learning Environments research group in Aalto University, Finland. It is part of the Learning Layers-research project
MALFORMED_NUMBER: Your number seems to not be valid!
NAME_MISSING: Looks like you're missing a contact name!
NO_CALLS_MADE: Looks like you haven't made any calls yet!
NO_CONTACTS_FOUND: Looks like your phone doesn't have any contacts that have SoAR installed
NUMBER_NOT_INTL: The number '{{number}}' does not seem to be an international phone number!
NUMBER_WRONG_FORMAT: The number does not seem right!
PASSWORD_AGAIN_MISSING: Please put in your password twice.
RECONNECT_FAILED: Reconnecting failed. Please wait and try again later
REGISTER_NUMBER_TEXT: OK, you should receive your code in a moment. You have an hour to use it, input your code and the password you want to use, twice
RESET_PASSWORD_TEXT: OK, you should receive your code in a moment. You have an hour to use it, input your code and the new password you want to use, twice
USER_EXISTS: The number you are attempting to register is already registered
VERIFICATION_EXPIRED: The code you used has expired. Please aqcuire a new one
VERIFICATION_USED: The code you used has alraedy been used once
VERIFY_EXIST: Already got a code? Tap here.
VERIFY_NUMBER_PASSWORD_TEXT: Put in the number you used to register below in international format. You will get an SMS with a one-time code for resetting your password
VERIFY_NUMBER_REGISTER_TEXT: Sign up with your phone number. Enter the number in international format. You will get an SMS with a one-time code required for registration
